# (PART) Going further {-}

# Where to go next

If you require an introduction to statistics, I recommend the free e-book <a href="https://www.learnstatswithjamovi.com/">Learning statistics with jamovi</a> by Danielle J. Navarro and David R. Foxcroft.

For other resources related to jamovi, see the <a href="https://www.jamovi.org/community.html">community resources page</a>.  

Questions regarding jamovi can be asked in the forum at <a href="https://forum.jamovi.org/">jamovi.org</a>.
